Now, the second element that makes an idol star like that is dance.
Dance.
But you have an image of that, don't you?
Really?
I really love dancing. I love to dance and I love to watch,
I didn't really like dancing when I was a member of 3BJr.
Oh, I didn't know that.
I wasn't good at it, and I didn't want to dance in front of everyone,
But then I got to be a back-up dancer for Arline's solo concert,
I started to spend more time with dance. And there, I realized that dancing is fun.
That's when I started to think that dancing is fun,
Now I love dancing the most.
There were some specific things that I had to do in terms of time,
Was there something about the way you presented yourself?
Was there a turning point for you?
Yes, it was. The more you practice, the better you get.
That's what free videotapes are for. The manager would take videos of my lessons.
When I watched them, I saw that the way I danced was changing more and more,
I really enjoyed those changes,
I started to study in front of the mirror, thinking about how I wanted to show it better,
I started to study in front of the mirror, thinking about what I wanted to show more like, and I started getting compliments on it,
I started getting compliments on it, and I realized that dancing is so much fun.
I see.
It was fun to practice.
It is true that your expression has changed since then.
Really?
And then people outside the company saw it at Stamp Fest and other events,
I knew it was true because of what you said.
So you do it at home.
I don't have a big mirror, so I turn off the TV and reflect myself.
Isn't that right?
Is that how you use the F-show TV?
Yes, it is.
It gets dark at night, so the windows also become mirrors.
It might be a common practice for dancers,
Can you do F-show TV at home?
Yes, I do.
Yes, because I'm being filmed.
My face will be a little cut off because of the reflection, but if I stand up, I'll be able to see it.
I don't get involved, but it would be nice to see.
If there was a bigger mirror,
If I had a bigger mirror, I would add more facial expressions.
Lately, I've been paying a lot of attention to expression management.
Expression management.
I've been trying to make funny faces.
I try to make funny faces.
I also try to make funny faces,
I also use a nighttime body, but it shows various images, so it is already a phase.
I'm not good at it at home, but I'm doing it.
I'm not very good at it, but I'm doing it at home.
